p: Based on current epidemiological investigations, the COVID-19 of median incubation period is 4.75 days (interquartile range: 3.0–7.2) days [ 38]. The main route transmission of COVID-19 is through respiratory droplets and close contact. A study found viruses in chairs, bed rails, glass windows, floors, light switches and toilets in patient rooms. However, the results of the air samples were negative, but the samples collected at the exhaust ports were positive, indicating that the air, surface environmental, and personal protective equipment contamination is a potential medium of transmission [ 39].
